title: Was Albert Einstein a fan of Friedrich Nietzsche's philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Einstein was a Deist. He believed in an impersonal God who created the universe. Nietzsche was an atheist. He died in the agonizing throws of near insanity. Nietzsche wore a teeshirt that said “God is dead.” God wears a teeshirt that says “Nietzsche is dead.” Moral of the story is that the very most intelligent people that have ever lived believed in God. It is more rational and logical. Don’t follow Nietzsche. He is a dead end trap.

when it came to metaphysics he was… in a way. However, in his biography (made from a collection of letters and accounts) he revered Kantian Philosophy over almost all others. There are not much difference between Kant and Nietzsche in the realm of ethics, but metaphysically there are a few which is probably why Kant stood out more than Nietzsche
